cain help rook to her feet.

(((Just couldn't stand her anymore, mate.)))

Anthony Vecchiono looked differently from the last time Dominick had seen him. His dark hair was longer, framing his heart shaped face. Deep, chocolate eyes were widened in shock. He was a tall and willowly boy, now 18. A rosery was about his neck, long and couloured pearl. "Dominick?"

cain left the room for in order to treat teh wound, the shirt must be taken off and well...yea. "this will sting..not as bad as the pain you are already in.." kai cleand out rook's wound and wrapped a long white bandage around her torso. "ok, you really shouldn't move around alot....like when you are making out with jack, your special someone...it'll cause pain...for me and cain already found that out...for you wound is right where cain's is."
"Aye," said Iye, wincing, "She's coming after you, mate."

Quingar watched, excited, as the door handle turned. Chance opened the door, and gasped. "Hello, dear cousin." Quingar said. "Let's cut right to the chase. You've had my men killed. I cared about them. Now it's your turn." He laughed, and opened one of Chance's closets. Something fell out. Chance's eyes brimmed with tears when he saw what it was. Skyler's body, a katana sticking out of the back of her head.

Dominick sat on the same bed he had sat on three years ago. The place was dark and there were papers lying on the floor. The window was wide open, a bird flew by. Dominick jumped when he heard a key turn in the door's lock.

kai told cain to grab the medical supplies and bring them over to her. she then saw the arrow on the floor. "you shouldn't of pulled it out! it could cause you to bleed even more!" seh then noticed teh arrows end thingy.. "Adrienne did this to you?!"
Chance had left the basement. He took the long way around to the Chic Boutique. He went up to his room, and opened the door.
Iye took hold of Kai's arm, "Pl-please," she said, "I have me-medical supplies here,"

kai knocked on rooks door. "Rook, hello, are you alright?!" she called. her sensitive ears picked up pain causing moans. she turned the knob and saw her there, injured. she rushed to her side. "we need to get you to the hospital.."

the kiss was deep and amorous. "ah!"cain pulled his lips away. pain was in his injured shoulder. "Are you ok? we should stop, it's causing pain in your injured shoulder." "no, i'm fine.." he tried to resume what they were doing but kai placed her finger to his lips. "no, your not-" cain had pushed her finger away and captured her lips with his own, cutting her off. she could not resist..she had to kiss him back...then she had built up enough self control and pushed him away. "illegal use of lips!" he looked at her with these eyes...that weakened her "..am i not a good kisser?.." 'yes,yes,yes you are!' she thought, '..must not give in....' but those eyes...and lips...they taunted her... his lips brushed her, he then kissed her lightly, slowly getting deeper... she gave up...she could no longer take it...she had to kiss back... but then, she felt a sharp pain in her head. she broke the kiss. "..i told you i'm fine..." "No, it's not that...i have a feeling...about rook...i think we should go back over there...i think she's in trouble..." cain agreed-even thought he didn't want to but he had to-. they left and rode one of kai's motorbikes to her living...space thingy.

Iye leaned on the window, breathing heavily. She took hold the arrow in her shoulder, took another breath, then yanked it out. She screamed, hot tears searing in her eyes. Taking hold of the one in her chest she sobbed once and pulled it out, a scream catching in her breath. Iye braced herself on the window, covering the wound on her stomache, trying to reach the phone. She got to it, slumping over on the couch and dialing Kai's number. No answer. Iye went to stand but let out another scream of mingled pain and frustration as another spasm racked her body. Her breathing grew shallow, her vision blurred. Chance...? she thought Jack! Kai?em> but no one was there, she was talking to air.

Caige stood up and aimed her loaded crossbow. "this shot might kill you...most likely will. it was nice meeting and i'm not going to hurt my mother dearest," she paused, "i'm going to kill her.." she fired and teh arrow hit rooks chest, just to teh left of rooks heart. "my aim always seems to fall to the left...ah well.." caige the walked to teh door and turned to rook and smiled. then exited the room. she left rook there, without a care, bleeding.
"AAH!!!" Iye jumped off, patting her shirt, "Hothothothothothothothot!!!"

"Silly little girl..." caige laughed. the blade soon glowed redish-orange. and rooks shirt caught on fire. "i do have another weapon.." she said snottily..well..in that area.. the flame was a greenish blue.

Iye sneered at her, "You're not leaving here alive," She moved back into defensive, "I will not allow you to hurt Kai," Iye then pounced, tackling the girl and sitting on top of her, blade to her throat and a hand on her stomache.

"i am at a disadvantage for my weapon are better equiped for far range and this, my dear, is not. and yet, you miss and i hit my opponent." she said "twas not even aiming!" she..sorta....boasted..(yea..she's a real french..uh...female dog..that's like teh perfect words to describe her...)

they fell over-cain lying on his side and kai on her back. Cain felt pain in his shoulder from the wound, but ignored it. cain then left trails of butterflies down to her neck. then buried his head, kissing her neck ever so gently. "aishiteru.."she whispered into cain's ear. her voice so soft and elegant. cain lifted his head and took a breath. he looked down at her lovely face in the moon's glow that was shining from the bay window. "mio amore....i l'amerà sempre, lei sono per sempre nel mio cuore.." -my love....i will always love you, you are forever in my heart...- he touched her face lightly, then brought her head up to his- causing her to sit up a little-and they kissed once more. cain held her head in his hands. she rested her arms on his shoulders-minding his injured one.
cain held kai in his arms, ever so lovingly. kai ended up sitting on cain's lap. cain slipped his other hand under her shirt on her lower back. kai played with cain's semi-long hair.
Iye was thrown back by the hit, skidding across the floor. She got up quickly, preparing to attack once more.
"Silly little girl!" she shot her arrow and hit rook in her left shoulder.
Iye ran at the girl, katana bared. She went to strike but the girl dodged, raising her crossbow to shoot.
"don't be silly, of course you do! All of you are preventing my mother dearest to be reunited with father.."
Though she knew who the girl was talking about Iye said, "I don't know what you're talking about,"
"You, Chance and Cain are friends with her, no?" she walked towards her. "so many people are getting in the way..."
"Then what do you want?" said Iye.
Caige pointed her crossbow towards rook's direction, but was not aiming. "You are friends with my mother dearest, no?"
Caige looked about rook's place. "nothing..."
Iye ran to an adjacent wall, getting a katana, "What do you want?" She took a defensive position.
Cain kissed kai in a James Bond manner(friends idear). she kissed back. she wrapped her arms around his neck. cain slipped his hand to the nape of her neck.
caige entered her dwelling. she loaded her crossbow. "Nice place.."

cain kissed kai's head. she looked up at him, his beautiful blue eyes were looking in to her eyes. their faces were only pecameters apart.
as soon as the door opened caige shot her bow. it whizzed right over head, any lower and rook would be missing an eye. (caige did it purposly)

"i think i shall visit that one they call 'rook'..." she walked down the street and was outside rook's door. 'what shall i use?' she thought. 'crossbow..or long bow?...'

cain wrapped his arms around her, resting his head upon hers. she drew circles around his navel with her finger tips lightly. her head was upon his chest, slowly rising and falling with every breath.

they reached her house and kai went into the bathroom to change. Cain sat on the couch. She came out wearing green plaid guy's boxers and a tank. Chance stared at the pile of rubble that used to be his house. He laughed. Before long he was in hysterics. He was laughing because his father had died in that fire. Still sniggering, he picked his way through the rubbish until he got to the in-ground door that led to the basement. He wrenched the door open, descended the steps, and sat near one of the three windows. It was dirty, there was dust floating in the air, and slight noises in the back of the cellar. Dismising them as rats, Chance pulled a small book out of his pocket and started to read.

'....i worry for chance and rook....' wwnt through kai's mind as she and cain walked down the street. (she hasn't been driving her motorbike lately....) they walked down the street hand in hand-laced.

it was getting late. Cain then stood up. "Yes, i think it'd be best if we left. it is getting late." kai stood up, cain grabbed her hand. "..ok," then kai turned to rook and gave her a heart filled hug, like she did with chance. "as i said with chance-friend, please be careful and i hope your okay. i worry for my friends.." then her and cain left. and walked to kai's house.

"Are you sure? i worry for my friend..."kai was concerned Cain watched chance. "Are you alright, mate?" hae asked.
Iye picked herself up off the floor, leaning against the door, "Aye," she said to Kai, "I'm fine,"

Frankie goes to Hollywood's song "Relax" played through the room. Chance turned the sound on his phone down to the lowest setting without muting it. He read the message, and dropped his phone on his lap. You could still slightly hear his ring tone playing. *" Relax, don't do it...*"
"I shall have to kill them..." caige said quietly. "kill them all...." she walked down the street, not sure where she was going.

Skyler's phone rang. She looked at the screen. ^Messg from: Drk. Zoolander^ She pushed a button, and Chance's message appeared. She read it super-fast, and replied: ^Quingar after u. He sent me 2 kll u. Dun go bak 2 TCB. He'll no ur there. Stay wre u r.^

Kai heard a thump coming from teh bathroom. "Rook-friend, are you okay?" she asked as she knocked on teh bathroom door with her free hand, for her other hand was holding her cup of tea. she tried to turn the the knob but it was locked. "...friend?..."

Chance pulled his cell phone out of the liner of his jacket, and two of his throwing stars fell to the floor. He picked them up, remembering that he had thrown one that time, and never got it back. He switched his phone back on. He sent a text message to Skyler: ^What u want? U called b-4, i was busy. u never call. must b imp. txt messg me bak.^ He avoided using real words on his phone. He sighed. It was true. Skyler never called. Something must of happened.

Iye sipped at the tea for a moment before putting the cup back down. "Excuse me," she went to the bathroom and sat on the edge of the bathtub. Once again a headache was welling up inside and a sick feeling registering in her stomache. Shakily, she went to the medicine cabinet, taking out bottles of coloured pills. One, two Freddie's coming for you She opened a bottle and the pills spilled out Three, four lock the door They began to fall onto the floor, she bent to pick them up, Five, six grab a crucifix The doctor said they would make the pain go away, Seven, eight stay up late She coughed, slipping and falling to the floor, laying amongst them. Nine, Ten...dead again ...Fade to black

Quingar went through Chance's room. He had decided to do the job himself, and was waiting in Chance's room. Quingar had wanted to go through Chance's wardrobe, as they're both of the same size and build, but when he got there, he realized that the wardrobe was a different room. He decided to just stay in Chance's room. Posters covered every inch of wall space, including some on the ceiling. The most prominent one was painted directly onto the wall across from Chance's bed. It was a mural of scenes from the movie Zoolander , and that is what most of the posters were, too. On one wall, Chance had only pictures. Pictures of his family. Chance's mother, Quingar's Aunt Victoria, had the most pictures up there. Quingar noticed that there were no pictures of his oldest cousin, Charles, up there. He also noticed that there were very few pictures of Skyler, and even less of himself. There were also no pictures of Quingar's Uncle Gary, Chance's homophobic father. He finished lookng at the walls, and started on the desk.

then kai noticed something. "Hey, the pains gone!"

"if he hadn't been holding me so tight I would of keeled over." He said, saying pronouncing 'over' as 'ov-air'. He blushed, and sighed.
"Romeo and Juliet didn't know eachother's names at first either," she smiled at him, "Did it make you week in the knees like in the old movies, when you kissed?"
"Well, I'm not even sure of his name, cara."

Kai awoke in the hospital. her vision was a little fuzzy, but she could see well enough. she looked about the room. "How come i always find myself at the bloomin' hospital?" she asked herslef out loud. Then she felt a sudden sickness in her stomach; a headache coming once again. She shook her head and rubbed her temples. The feeling started to subside. "Hold up. I thought I head Rook's and Chance's voice before. Where the bloomin' are they?" The feeling came back. ~ok, i really have to get out of here.~ she thought. Just as she srated to get up, she really started to feel sick. She plopped back down; groaning. A sudden sharp pain shot through her stomach. she cried out in pain. she curled up into a ball on the hospitial bed. Her head became to pound harder. She felt like someone was beating upon her head with some heavy, blunt object. And that someone was stabbing her repeatedly in the gut with a sharp dagger of some sort.
Quingar sighed, and thought ~ Ich soll wirk lich seperate mich selbest von ihm. Es ist zu gefahrlich.~
"What are you doing here?" said Iye once more, "Did you do this to Kai??"
Chance smiled, thinking ~They know each other?~
Finally, being the ditzy airhead that she is, Iye noticed that Dominick was there. "Wait a minute," she said, looking at the dark haired Italian, "What are you doing here?"
Dominick turned, seeing someone in his peripheral vision. A boy stood there, staring at him. Dominick said, "Si, can i help you...?"
Chance rolled his eyes and moved closer to Dominick.
"I will!! I wi-" Iye stopped as Chance gave her a look, "Nevermind, i'll stay here."
The hospital guy just shrugged, and rushed Kai out the door. Another guy said "Who's coming with?"
"Jeez, what took you so long??" said Iye, rolling her eyes, "You guys are always so late, no wonder people die."
Chance didn't get to answer, because hospital people burst through the door.
"Chance," Iye whined, "What're we gonna do if Kai doesn't get well again...i mean......we're like the three musketeers, only not fluffy and chocolatey."

Quingar pushed Jean-Michel away. The Frenchman had only said that he thought Quingar should decide how to kill his cousin, a different way than last time. "Je manque comment vous aves atilise pour etre." Jean Michel said quietly. "That freakin' schoolboy'll never be back. Sometimes I get the feeling that we used to be best friends. That you want the schoolboy I used to be back." Jean-Michel pulled Quingar close. "Vous etes mo mei lleur ami." ~He's still upset with me." Quingar thought. ~He hates it more than anything when I don't listen to his opinions.~ Quingar put his arms around Jean-Michel, just like they used to do on cold nights at school. ~~~~~~////Memories of Winter, begin.\\\\~~~~~~ Jean-Michel rested his head on Quingar's chest. Quingar was freezing. He had given Jean-Michel his jacket and sweater. ~But he does keep me warmer.~ he thought as Jean-Michel pulled himself close to Quingar, just short of laying on him. ~This stupid survival test'll kill him. He's fragile.~ Quingar felt guilty saying this, looking at the bruises and cuts he himself had made on Jean-Michel. ~~~~~~////Memories of Winter, end.\\\\~~~~~~

Her surroundings began to spin. "erg..."she was not feeling well, well, she wasn't feeling well to begin with; she was feeling worse. she fell down- she was lying down now. her head bagan to pound once more, a sick feeling brewing. she passed out again. but this time, she could feel things. A few moments later, she felt someone..could've been two people, she couldn't really tell, picked her up and laid her on another bed. Quingar watched from the door to his bedroom. ~I don't know why he loves me so much.~ Jean-Micheal knew he was there. ~I don't know why I love him so much.~ Quingar slowly moved over to Jean-Michel and picked him up. Jean-Michel opened his mouth to say something, but Quingar shook his head. He layed Jean-Michel down on his bed, and went to get something to treat his slight injuries, and some ice for his neck. As he worked, he said "Jean-Michel........I'm sorry." "It's not your fault. You've never been able to control your temper." Quingar said something quietly. "What?" "I said.....I said.....you're...you're my best friend. My only friend. Nobody is more important to me than you. That's why I can't hang around you anymore."Jean-Michel's eyes filled with tears. "I don't want to hurt you anymore, Jeanny." "You haven't called me that for such a long time. But I will not leave. I do not want you to be alone." Quingar smiled, and nodded. As he turned to shut off the lights, he said "You have the most gorgeus eyes I've ever seen."

Kai hugged her knees, slowly rocking back and forth; sniffling. She stared at the floor through tear-filled eyes, humming. She slipped her hand into the area between the bed and the headboard and pulled out a kunai. She held it in front of her, staring at it. She pressed the sharp edge against her palm of the other hand (her right hand). The blade's kiss was cold at first. She then added a little pressure and dragged it across her palm. It left a trail of blood behind. She set the kunai down upon the bed and watched the blood congeal. She then brought her scored hand over to the side of the bed and held it over the edge. She watched as one drop fell to the floor. She watched as more drops fell, splattering crimson on her wood floor. After about the fourth drop, she started to keep track on how many fell. "….five……six….seven…." she whispered. With her free hand she picked up the kunai, brought it to her lips, held it there for a second, and then licked off the copper-tasting sorrow. "…blood…how I love the taste…." She then put the kunai back in its hidden spot. She still kept count. ~….twelve…..~

Iye looked Dominick in the eyes, not even noticing his new appearance. A look of disdain crossed her face and she looked away. "Leave me alone," she whispered. He stepped closer to her, "Poor, poor Iye." The Italian stopped just behind her, "If it's any consolation he died asking me not to harm you," Iye shuddered a sob, "you know," he continued, "you can just make it easier on yourself," he produced a switchblade from his pocket and handed it to her. Iye took it and looked at the metal shining with newly spilled blood. She pushed herself away from Jack and stood, turning to look at Dominick. "I'll kill you," she whispered so quietly it was almost inaudible. He smiled, "I'm sure you will," Just then, Iye rose the blade and lunged at him. He easily deflected it and grabbed her arm, tossing her aside. Moments later he had her from behind, holding her arms behind her back. When he spoke, his voice was heavy, close to her ear, "When i'm done here, care to know who i'm going after next?" Iye tried to get free but she hadn't the strength compared to him. "A bit of an irony i might say," he purred, "he'll never have a Chance ," That gave Iye the strength she needed, that simple threat. She elbowed his rib cage, bringing her head back to smash it into his face. Dominick stumbled back, covering his now bleeding nose. Iye scrambled to grab the switchblade and came into a poised stance, ready to attack. Dominick laughed at her, "I wanted to take my time with this but it looks like you won't go down without a fight," He pulled the gun from his belt and aimed at her, "tell bunny-boy i said hi." The shot rang out in the silent apartment and for a moment things froze-until Dominick realized Iye was gone. He looked around but there was no sign of her. Then, as he took a step forward, he was stopped by a blade being pressed into his back. "Did you forget, Dominick, that i'm a jumper?" He grimaced, "Apparently so," with that he spun around quickly, taking her by surprise and shooting once more. Iye dodged and ran at him once more, this time grabbing his wrist and wrenching the weapon free. She picked it up, jumping back from him and aiming. He smiled at her, "What are you going to do? Shoot me?" Iye's hand shook but she kept aim. "Give me the gun, Iye," He took a step towards her, but she stepped back, "Don't come near me!" She screamed, but he didn't listen, he took another step, and it sent Iye over the edge. The shot hit Dominick square in the chest. His eyes widened and he mumbled something before touching the wound and looking at the new blood on his fingertips. But, it seemed that in that one moment, something changed about him. He looked up and at Iye, eyebrows creased in question as he asked, "Iye...what..." He stumbled back, against the wall, looking around, "how'd I get here..." he slowly sank to the ground, staring into Iye's bleu eyes, wanting answers. "Iye," he asked again but his voice was fading as his head fell, chin resting against his chest, "...t-tell Chance....I...." Dominick didn't finish sentance, instead he fell into an inconsceousness (sp?). Iye dropped the weapon, sinking to her knees, tears pooling in her eyes.

It was later when Iye finally got home that night. The apartment was quiet and had the smell of her perfume. On the table to the right of the couch was a lone rose with a piece of paper that read : bedroom. Iye smiled, stripping of her coat and shoes, heading to the room. As she entered she realized that the writing on the paper wasn't Jack's. He lay there, on the white sheets, nestled to look as though he were asleep. She would've thought so if it were not for the many bleeding wounds on his body. Iye ran to his side, "Jack, Jack!" She brushed his hair from his eyes, noticing they were half lidded. "Jack, answer me, please!" His eyes flickered and he turned slightly to look up at her. "I-Iye," his voice, was quiet, gurgling. When he spoke blood dripped from the corner of his mouth. "Oh god, Jack," Tears brimmed her eyes, "what happened??" Jack just smiled, slightly, wincing, "Iye, i-i'm sorry," he coughed softly, "i di-didn't mean...to kiss her," Iye let out a sob, "No, no it's ok, it doesn't matter," Slowly, he lifted a bloody hand to caress her cheek, leaving a red trail behind, "I.....love you....Iye." He smiled once more, drawing her close for a kiss until his hand fell to his side, his body growing still. Iye sobbed, hugging Jack close and layed her head on his chest. "Jack," she sobbed, holding him close, "no," Then, from the corner, she heard, "Tut Tut, little bird, don't cry for someone who didn't deserve it." Iye turned to find that she wasn't alone in the room.

Kai awoke, crying her eyes out. She had her knees bent up to her chest, her arms wrapped around them. She looked at clock on her nightstand. It read 12:17am. She then looked out the window, out at the nightsky. She stared at the stars and moon through tear filled eyes. She wouldn't last very long being the way she was. She couldn't sleep without waking up in tears, or without tears in her sleep. That's when she thought about Rook and Jack. ~..Rook, hang on to Jack......you guys still have each and have a chance to be with each other........~ she said loudly in her thought. ~Rook, don' end up like me........I have forever lost my love and I can't get it back...you still can......Rook, don' end up like a me...crying in your sleep, if ye can even get sleep for you always wake up tearing.........~ She sniffled and more tears streaming. ~..I don' know how long i can go on like this.........~

Jack sat in the dark, fighting back the urge to just go and raid Iye's medicine closet, putting himself into a drug enduced coma might solve things...that or atleast stop how horrible he felt and end Iye's hatred. He shook his head, turning to look out the window. Just then there was a knock at the door. He didn't move. The door did, though, and a split second later, standing in the doorway was a much shorter haired Dominick. Jack looked at him, and noticed the weapon on his belt. Dominick closed the door and stood there, looking out the window. To break the silence, Jack asked, "What do you want?" The Italian smiled slyly, "Oh, nothing really." He walked slowly towards Jack, "I've just been thinking," Jack eyed him precariously as he drew closer. "And i figured, that, in the grand scheme of things," Dominick went to his belt and drew the gun, looking it over in a fake inquisitiveness, "you are really in the way." It was a flash of silver and bullets that lit the room. Jack was crouched into a corner, his arm bleeding from a bullet wound whereas Dominick stood only meters away, bleeding from where a shuriken embedded itself in his thigh. He smiled, once more, pulling the blade out and tossing it aside. "Come now, if you just hold still it won't hurt as much." Jack crouched even lower, "Like Hell i will," and with that he was off, speeding quickly towards the Italian, grabbing his legs and tackling him to the ground. Moments later he had scrambled on top of him, a blade to his throat. "I want you to leave and i want you to leave now," said Jack, the blade almost drawing blood. Dominick looked Jack in the eyes, daring him on but Jack did not respond. "A bleeding heart is not suitable for a ninja," said Dominick then suddenly he brought his knee up, smashing it into Jack's lower back. Jack fell to the ground, writhing from the momentary paralysis. Dominick grabbed his shirt and pulled him into a sitting position to slam him into the wall. The Italian pulled out a blade and flicked it in front of Jack, smiling at what he was intending to do.
